Amanda Visconti is a research web developer and digital humanities professor. I design, prototype, & study digital interfaces for social reading & learning and participatory user communities, grounded on a strong research background (PhD, MS) in HCI, info science, & the digital humanities (literature, history...).

Contact me to collaborate, or check out my online portfolio & resume & Twitter.
